short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A memory game - click the squares!  Made by CCIB

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In this game, there are 5x5 squares of box.
A few blocks will show up as the game starts.
The amount of blocks is depending on the gamemode you choose
You have to remember the order of the buttons, then press it in order.
For alphabet mode, it starts with "A", otherwise, start with "1".
There is some diffrent gamemodes you can try!
